name: Venkatesh Mogili
about: I'm a Founder of VM Online Training and a Full Stack Web and Mobile App Developer with 4+ years of experience. I'm a YouTuber, Online Instructor, Provided training for 300+ students within a span of 2 months. 7+ full courses created, Made one course for Udemy, Got best performer award within 2 months of joining in Xelpmoc as Intern, Won StackHack1.0 Challenge conducted in HackerEarth , Delivered a messenger app using React Native and Node within 4 days for US Client as a freelancing project, having 80+ github repositories, worked in various start-up companies till now and Looking forward to work in many interesting and challenging projects.
